details.title: Data Migration Pipeline
details.description: Created a data migration pipeline that would facilitate the backfilling of millions of entries of historical transaction data from an Amazon-internal database platform to AWS DynamoDB.

details.title: Dummy Data Generator
details.description: Wrote a Java library that generated random dummy JSON data en masse based on a supplied specification, to test the data migration pipeline.

details.title: Developer Operations
details.description: Participated in developer operations for my team's owned services. This included overseeing code deployment pipelines, maintaining integration tests, and troubleshooting alarms.

details.title: “Alexa, Pay for Gas!”
details.description: Wrote Natural Language Understanding (NLU) grammars for several Alexa Money Domain projects using an Alexa-internal Domain Specific Language.

details.title: Political Donations using Alexa
details.description: Worked on the NLU and Java backend components for enabling donations to US 2020 presidential election candidates. Worked on making the involved systems compliant with US Federal and state laws.

details.title: Amazon Pay components on the Alexa mobile app
details.description: Implemented Amazon Pay's UI elements on the Alexa mobile app on Android and iOS. Used the React Native framework and TypeScript. Performed testing using Android Studio and XCode.

details.title: Merchant Payments using Alexa
details.description: Worked on enabling the Alexa payments platform in Europe and Japan regions.

details.title: Tutoring
details.description: Tutored two students over Zoom. Courses included Object Oriented Programming and Design Patterns in Java.

details.title: World Factbook Scraper
details.description: Wrote a node.js library to scrape CIA's World Factbook.

details.title: CSE214 – Data Structures
details.description: Hosting office hours, hosting recitations, grading assignments and exam papers.

details.title: CSE114 – Intro. to Object-Oriented Programming
details.description: Hosting office hours, hosting recitations, grading assignments and exam papers.
